title: Short
sub: Pixies and other short hairstyles. Going from long to short? Book an Extra Time Haircut.

title: Mid Length/Long
sub: For hair ear length and longer.

title: Extra Time Haircut
sub: For those with lots of hair or very long hair, and those going from long to short.

title: Bang Trim
sub: One complimentary bang trim between haircuts for existing clients. Existing bangs only.

title: Blow Out
sub: Shampoo + blow out. Included in all color and cut services, or scheduled solo.

title: Keratin
sub: Semi-permanent smoothing treatment for eliminating frizz.
